name: phpcompatibility/phpcompatibility-passwordcompat
description: A ruleset for PHP_CodeSniffer to check for PHP cross-version compatibility issues in projects, while accounting for polyfills provided by ircmaxell's password_compat library.

suggest.dealerdirect/phpcodesniffer-composer-ins: ^1.0 || This Composer plugin will sort out the PHP_CodeSniffer 'installed_paths' automatically.
suggest.roave/security-advisories: dev-master || Helps prevent installing dependencies with known security issues.
